about_the_game:
All resources in this game are for learning and reference purposes only regarding the exploration of lunar culture. They must not be used for any other purposes, especially not for commercial promotion. Violators will be held accountable.

About this game:

"Journey to the Moon" is an interactive game that combines lunar exploration with art and culture, as well as science popularization. The core of its development is "space life is coming eventually". Players will experience and explore the future cultural and art center built on the lunar surface by switching between first-person and third-person perspectives. Through four levels, "Journey to the Moon" presents to players ancient Chinese moon culture, modern lunar exploration projects, and future human space life. In 2025, this work will be presented on the screen of China's first art satellite "SCA-1 Satellite", which is currently in orbit, as one of the "Infinite Utopia" cosmic interactive spaces in artist Hao Ruichang's space art project (Phase II) (Xu Bing Art Satellite Residency Project). This work will also serve as a practical slice of the aerospace era and the emerging art field, exploring the feasibility of future "integrated space and ground curation".

Story Background:

With the gradual realization of the five major themes of national space science exploration and the construction of a habitable lunar base by the lunar exploration project, humans will gradually move to the moon in the future and establish a "Moon Path" museum on the lunar surface to commemorate the journey of lunar exploration and look forward to an even more exciting future life in space...

Detailed Tutorial:

WASD / Move

Space bar / Jump

Mouse wheel / Zoom in and out

E/Interactive Button

F/Operating Instructions

G/ Tourist Visa

T/News Flash

ESC/Menu key

Some model materials are sourced from:

 Divi Model

Some audio materials are sourced from:

China Philharmonic Orchestra "Above the Moon (Symphony Version)", "To the Moon" Main Theme, "To the Moon" Moonwisher, "To the Moon" Born a Stranger, "To the Moon" Laura Shigihara - Everything

Image, video and data sources: China Lunar Exploration and Deep Space Exploration Network, China Science and Technology News Network, Beijing Association for Science and Technology, , , , Baidu Baike, Baidu Scholar

Font source:

Dot Dot Pixel Font - Square, ZCOOL Premium Black Revision 151105

movies.name: Moon Journey - China's Lunar Exploration Digital Museum

name: Moon Journey - China's Lunar Exploration Digital Museum

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R)Core(TM)i5-9300HF CPU @ 2.40GHZ
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti
  • Storage: 64 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVlDlA Virtual Audio Device (Wave Extensible)(WDM)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R)Core(TM)i5-9300HF CPU @ 2.40GHZ
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti
  • Storage: 64 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVlDlA Virtual Audio Device (Wave Extensible)(WDM)

publishers: 福建省动漫游戏行业协会
泉州青春志动漫科技有限公司
